subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Johnny Damon left the Red Sox after winning a title in 2004. As a free agent coming off the Yankees’ championship team, he could be facing the same situation this off-season.
snippet: Johnny Damon left the Red Sox after winning a title in 2004. As a free agent coming off the Yankees’ championship team, he could be facing the same situation this off-season.
